feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest React4j news and events.

entry.title: Website Launched
entry.summary: This marks the date when the website was launched. The website marks the time when the development on the core features of React4J stabilized enough that documenting the toolkit became viable. For now see the [Javadocs]({{ site.baseurl }}/api/index.h
